name: mern-testing-assignment
description: MERN Stack Testing and Debugging Assignment

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.test: concurrently "cd client && npm test" "cd server && npm test" --kill-others --success first
scripts.test:coverage: concurrently "cd client && npm test -- --coverage" "cd server && npm test -- --coverage" --kill-others --success first
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "cd client && npm test -- --watchAll" "cd server && npm test -- --watchAll" --kill-others --success first
